name: Slime Stars
description:
Controls 

Blocks are solid if you're the same colour as them. Change the colour of your slime to slip through blocks and platform your way through each stage!

  • Left/Right Arrow to move
  • Space to jump
  • Number keys 1-4 to change colour
Slime Stars is a very small puzzle platformer built for the GDL Discord server's Quantum Game Jam. 

I built the game on my own in ~14 hours. The difficulty certainly ramps up quite a bit for the last couple of levels. Treat it as a small slice of a game, as I think I quite liked the idea and mechanics, so will definitely build on this and release a more complete feeling version over the coming weeks.

Feel free to leave me any feedback you may have, it's always welcome!
